ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: A large group of the earlier people
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: a large throng from the ancients,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: These (people of the right hand) consist of many from the ancient
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: A large group from the earlier generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: A multitude of those will be from the first generation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: A numerous company from among the first,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: A multitude of those of old
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: a large group of the earlier people
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: A (goodly) number from those of old,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: A multitude of those (on the Right Hand) will be from the first generation (who embraced Islam).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: A company of the former peoples
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (A multitude of those of old) a group of people from among the nations which came before Muhammad (pbuh)
